channel.title: Help on max lvling plz!

item.title: Help on max lvling plz!
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

wait …
[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 04:13:40 PM[/size][hr]open client.java and search for:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }

Change all the 135’s to the number you want max level, I’ve gone 200 on my server. Too make it be level 200 for every stat, change all the 135’s to 200, and the 300.0 to 400.0, so it should look like this.

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 200; }

Now for alot of my commands Search /END OF FRAME TESTING/
after that click enter

and add these:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(1400000000, 0); addSkillXP(1400000000, 1); addSkillXP(1400000000, 2); addSkillXP(1400000000, 3); addSkillXP(1400000000, 4); addSkillXP(1400000000, 5); addSkillXP(1400000000, 6); addSkillXP(1400000000, 7); addSkillXP(1400000000, 8); addSkillXP(1400000000, 9); addSkillXP(1400000000, 10); addSkillXP(1400000000, 11); addSkillXP(1400000000, 12); addSkillXP(1400000000, 13); addSkillXP(1400000000, 14); addSkillXP(1400000000, 15); addSkillXP(1400000000, 16); addSkillXP(1400000000, 17); addSkillXP(1400000000, 18); addSkillXP(1400000000, 19); addSkillXP(1400000000, 20); addSkillXP(1400000000, 21); addSkillXP(1400000000, 22); addSkillXP(1400000000, 23); addSkillXP(1400000000, 24); sendMessage("You been Maxed!"); }

No problem

  • Svenimen_s

Read full topic

item.title: Help on max lvling plz!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_CubSmiles Mod_CubSmiles
item.description:
@Mod_CubSmiles wrote:

i edited my client.java and did what a tutorial said and it wont work for some reason
and my command for it doesnt work and it says “max xp vavlue reached” what do i do???
this is what i changed and how it looks…

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 200;

and…this is the command part

/END OF FRAME TESTING/

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(1400000000, 0);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 1);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 2);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 3);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 4);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 5);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 6);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 7);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 8);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 9);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 10);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 11);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 12);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 13);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 14);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 15);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 16);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 17);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 18);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 19);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 20);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 21);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 22);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 23);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 24);
sendMessage(“You been Maxed!”);
}
